pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, March 29, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, March 29, 2018:

Ottawa, Ontario

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Inuit-Crown Partnership Committee Leaders Meeting.

Room 2005, 2nd Floor
James Michael Flaherty Building
90 Elgin Street

Notes to media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 7:30 a.m.
